items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile, great fit, and easy to style
items.body: I'm 5'7", 125 lbs, and I got the small. This is a WONDERFUL dress. Slight stretch, good material. Once I steam the wrinkles from shipping, I don't think it will wrinkle easily. The length on me is below the knee, which is just what I wanted. I love the wider straps; they don't dig in and they conceal the bra straps. The fit on this is amazing. I'm not gifted with "huge tracks of land" if you catch my meaning, and this dress works with that. I can just as easily see it working with ladies with more acreage, but I think if you have over a C cup, you may want to consider the medium. The dress will still fit you well because of the cut. I got the black dress, but I think I'll be getting the apricot as well. This is a great staple piece for your wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Shauna Ow

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute versatile dress
items.body: This dress is a soft, silky, and nice heavy knit material. I bought it for Halloween Belle costume, but plan on wearing it more than just halloween! It is cute as is or layered with shirts under (see white dress under), turtle necks, sweaters / tops over it, or just wearing as is! For reference I am 5’9” 154lbs, waist 29.5” hips 39.5” bust 36” and I got a medium and it fits perfectly. Has stretch to it Read more
items.author: Abs0fsteel

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great!
items.body: Love this dress!! worked perfect for my bridal shower, I would recommend sizing down, it is extremely stretchy which makes it super comfortable. It does not cling to your stomach which is super nice. The Fabric is thicker and feels high quality Read more
items.author: Lilly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple but classic
items.body: It fit me perfectly, and was so pretty for an autumn wedding. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Wedding attire
items.body: This fit me perfect i wear a size xl, 5’7 and 220. Color is so pretty and bright. Perfect to dance in all night at a wedding so comfy and lightweight. It did come a bit wrinkly but a really great dress and quality for the price. Read more
items.author: Deanna simon

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars This dress stinks
items.body: Stitching is crooked, material is thin and feels like something a costume would be made of. Neckline is not even-it slants to the left, and it is much shorter than anticipated. The darts down the front are awkward. This is just an awful dress. The $14 price tag isn't even enough to entice me to keep it. Read more
items.author: Lisa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect all occasion dress
items.body: fits perfectly, great material, hides bulges Read more
items.author: Jo F

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
